name: Hungry Myshka
description:
View our entry here : https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/49/hungry-myshka

---

👵🐕🧪👹

You are an old lady living in the surroundings of Tchernobyl.
Your beloved dog Myshka came back from its stroll today. But it seems...different?
On your way to the veterinary to make it examined, Myshka asks you to feed him radioactive mushrooms protected by guards.

Make sure it does not starve nor eat too much. Who knows what could happen?
